Correction to: Exploring an online method of measuring implicit sequence‑learning consciousness
Feng Lu1 · Chunlu Huang2 · Chuanlin Zhu3 · Yue He4 · Deming Shu4 · Dianzhi Liu4,5
Accepted: 22 December 2022 / Published online: 29 December 2022 © Springer-Verlag GmbH Germany, part of Springer Nature 2022
Correction to: Experimental Brain Research (2022) 240:3141–3152
https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s00221- 022- 06482-9
In this article, the affiliation details for Authors Chuanlin Zhu3 · Yue He4 · Deming Shu4 · Dianzhi Liu4 were incorrectly published in wrong order but should have been as given below:
3 School of Educational Science, Yangzhou University, Yangzhou, China 4 Department of Psychology, Soochow University, Suzhou, China
Publisher's Note Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
The original article can be found online at https:// doi. org/ 10. 1007/ s00221- 022- 06482-9.
* Dianzhi Liu psyl2021@126.com
1 School of Education Science, Taizhou University, Taizhou, China 2 Jiangsu Educational Press Group, Nanjing, China 3 School of Educational Science, Yangzhou University,
Yangzhou, China 4 Department of Psychology, Soochow University, Suzhou,
China 5 Ren Ai Street #199, Suzhou 215123, China

title: Correction to: Exploring an online method of measuring implicit sequence-learning consciousness
